TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SecurityContext extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class SecurityContext Implements IDisposable
public ref class SecurityContext sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 表示队列消息的安全上下文。

span.span: Represents the security context for a message in a queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全上下文包含如内部证书，相应的私钥，用户的 SID，将证书和发送方标识符附加到一条消息，请求身份验证时所需的缓存的安全信息。The security context contains cached security information such as an internal certificate, the corresponding private key, the user's SID, needed to attach a certificate and the sender identifier to a message when requesting authentication. 如果为客户端，例如 ASP.NET 应用程序，模拟某个用户将向队列发送一条消息，用户的标识用于访问队列。If a client, such as an ASP.NET application, impersonates a user to send a message to a queue, the identity of the user is used to access the queue. 如果队列是远程的这些凭据是缓存，用于随后发送到队列的消息。If the queue is remote, these credentials are cached and used for messages that are subsequently sent to the queue. 因此，在随后的消息中的 SID 将消息发送到队列的第一个用户的缓存的标识。Therefore, the SID in subsequent messages will be the cached identity of the first user that sent a message to the queue. 将消息发送到队列的第一个用户的缓存的标识将用于后续用户。The cached identity of the first user that sent a message to the queue will be used for subsequent users. 若要解决此问题，设置安全上下文中使用之前将一条消息发送到远程队列以确保当前用户的凭据用于获取队列的访问权限。To overcome this problem, set the security context using before sending a message to a remote queue to ensure that the current user's credentials are used to gain access to the queue. 但是，建议的最佳做法是：However, the suggested best practice is to: 1. 使队列已经过身份验证的队列。Make the queue an authenticated queue. 2. 运行 ASP.NET 应用程序域标识和授权该应用程序可以写入队列。Run the ASP.NET application as a domain identity and authorize that application to write to the queue. 3. 使用队列时，则不模拟用户。Do not impersonate the user when using the queue. 相反，获取调用方的标识，以及执行授权检查 ASP.NET 应用程序中或在消息中包含调用方的标识和执行授权检查在接收方应用程序中。Instead, get the caller’s identity and either perform authorization checking in the ASP.NET application or include the caller’s identity as part of the message and perform authorization checking in the receiver application.
